text: The Turkey women's water polo team is a water polo team that represents Turkey at water polo competitions. ==Results== ===European Championship=== {| class="wikitable" width=50% style="text-align: center;font-size:100%;" !colspan=10|European Water Polo Championship |- !width=25%|Year !width=25%|Round !width=8%|Pld !width=8%|W !width=8%|D !width=8%|L !width=8%|GS !width=8%|GA !width=10%|GD |- |2016||12th place||6||0||0||6||18||132||−114 |- |2018||12th place||6||0||0||6||32||131||−99 |- !Total||2/17||12||0||0||12||50||263||−213 |} ====European Championship Qualification==== {| class="wikitable" width=50% style="text-align: center;font-size:100%;" !colspan=10|European Water Polo Championship |- !width=25%|Year !width=25%|Round !width=8%|Pld !width=8%|W !width=8%|D !width=8%|L !width=8%|GS !width=8%|GA !width=10%|GD |-bgcolor=#9acdff |2016||Qualify||6||2||0||4||65||83||−18 |-bgcolor=#9acdff |2018||Qualify||2||1||1||0||21||20||+1 |- !Total||2/10||8||3||1||4||86||103||−17 |} ===Mediterranean Games=== {| class="wikitable" width=50% style="text-align: center;font-size:100%;" !colspan=10|Water polo at the Mediterranean Games |- !width=25%|Year !width=25%|Round !width=8%|Pld !width=8%|W !width=8%|D !width=8%|L !width=8%|GS !width=8%|GA !width=10%|GD |- |2018||6th Place||3||0||0||3||17||59||−42 |- !Total||1/1||3||0||0||3||17||59||−42 |} ==Current squad== Roster for the 2018 Women's European Water Polo Championship.
